Description.Text: Posh Pads at the historical Casartelli building is the perfect alternative to a hotel suite. With your very own spacious 2 bedroom 4 or 5 star apartment you'll find all the comforts of home such as a large LCD Flat screen TV, iPod Dock & DVD player on request combined with the privacy and freedom only a serviced apartment can offer but with all the facilities you would expect to find in a hotel, such as 24 hour reception, concierge service and on site restaurant. Lime Street Train station is just a 5 minute walk away as well as both Liverpool and Everton football clubs just a 15 minute taxi ride away. Your sumptuous apartment also contains a fully equipped kitchen, dining area and spacious luxurious lounge. Upon arrival you will be greeted by their friendly and informative staff who will show you to your apartment where you will find fresh milk, tea, coffee, sugar, biscuits, luxurious bathrobes (Penthouses Only), and Gilcrest and Soames toiletries have all been provided for your convenience. Here at Posh Pads the hotel believe that going the extra mile really makes your stay special & memorable, so whether you are visiting the city for business or pleasure book your Posh Pad now and let the caring, knowledgeable team take care of your every need. For your convenience the hotel also provide secure underground car parking, available at 10 per car per night. Free WI-FI available in reception area and a limited number of internet USB devices are available subject to availability at an additional charge of 5 per device per day. Continental & Hot breakfast may be delivered straight to your apartment door for an additional charge, please arrange this with Posh Pads direct. Please note a 150 card pre authorization is required per apartment upon arrival. None residents will not be permitted into the building. No guests under the age of 21 (unless accompanied by an adult) the hotel politely ask those seeking accommodation with the intention to party to seek alternative accommodation. No same sex groups for 3 apartments or more.

Situated in the heart of the city center facing the brand new Liverpool1 shopping center your Posh Pad is just a short stroll away from an array of fine bars & restaurants, historical Albert Dock, the ECHO arena & BT Convention centre and Beatles Story.

4 Star Corporate - The room offers one double bed. An executive apartment for the business guest who wants more than 4 walls and a bathroom, the hotel offer 4 times the space of a hotel at the same cost to you and also all the facilities and service that you would expect out of any hotel
4 Star Apartment - The room offers one double bed or two twin beds. This is a versatile double bedroom apartment that can be set up as a twin or a double double and also come with 2 bathrooms
4 Star Apartment - The room offers two double beds. This is a luxurious 2 bed-roomed 2 bath-roomed apartment that offers flexibilities so can sleep 2 couples or 4 singles
5 Star Master Suite - The room offers one double bed or one king size bed and bedding varies. This is one of the 5 star penthouse which offer versatile accommodation, 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, air conditioning and many more extras
5 Star Master Suite - The room offers one double bed or one king size bed and bedding varies. This is one of the 5 start super sized duplex penthouses which offers 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, air conditioning and many extras stretched over 2 floors of the building the accomodation and bed set up is versatile and can be changed to accomodate up to 6 people
